title: Can this be the season we can exchange Victorious skins?
body:
Cuz like Maokai?
I'd rather exchange that for just about any other victorious skin.

replies.body: Concur. Unless it's freaking amazing I'll still use Meowkai over it.
IKR, Spent a lot of hours finally making it to gold. Not sure if I should just drop back to bronze and forgot all about it.

I really wish we could, 

Hell I'd trade this mao skin for a regular skin than just a victorious one.
